oak.description: One of the oldest woods on the planet. Useful in many crafting recipes. Not the best wood, but it won't let you down.
oak.location: Found by **Foraging** :axe: in most areas with **Axe Power** of at least **1**.

birch.description: Fragile, but a very gorgeous looking wood. Useful in recipes, where a more nimble wood is required.
birch.location: Found by **Foraging** :axe: in most areas with **Axe Power** of at least **1**.

spruce.description: Strong and ancient wood that's accustomed to harsh climates. Very reliable wood.
spruce.location: Found by **Foraging** :axe: in most areas with **Axe Power** of at least **1**.

maple.description: A beautiful looking tonewood that carries sound waves well and is useful in other miscellaneous recipes.
maple.location: Found by **Foraging** :axe: in most areas with **Axe Power** of at least **1**.

cedar.description: Often used in rituals and as ornamental trees. Also useful in oils and other decorational elements.
cedar.location: Found by **Foraging** :axe: in most areas with **Axe Power** of at least **1**.

carrot.description: A hardy, versatile root vegetable useful for a quick snack. Isn't too nutritious unless cooked with other ingredients.

potato.description: Probably the worst root vegetable to eat on its own. Too hard, too tasteless. Best when cooked with other ingredients.

wheat.description: Not edible. I don't know why you'd want to anyway. One of the most useful cooking ingredients.

mudwart.description: A mysterious wart pulled out of the depths of muddy, swampy soil. Not edible on its own but amazingly useful in many crafing recipes for its healing properties.

seaweed.description: A kinda creepy, slimy piece of weed in the sea. Despite being fairly useless, it's still used in some recipes. Can't call it trash afterall.
seaweed.location: Found by **Fishing** :fishing_pole_and_fish: in most areas with **Fishing Rod Power** of at least **1**.

old boot.location: Found by **Fishing** :fishing_pole_and_fish: in most areas with **Fishing Rod Power** of at least **1**.

rubber duck.location: Found by **Fishing** :fishing_pole_and_fish: in most areas with **Fishing Rod Power** of at least **1**.

cod.description: Common pond fish. Easy to catch, not too nutritious, but it's still food.
cod.location: Found by **Fishing** :fishing_pole_and_fish: in most areas with **Fishing Rod Power** of at least **1**.

perch.description: Common pond fish. Quite hard to catch, they put up a fight and aren't too nutritious on their own.
perch.location: Found by **Fishing** :fishing_pole_and_fish: in most areas with **Fishing Rod Power** of at least **1**.

bass.description: One of the most common fish on the planet. They're everywhere, they grow fast and they're tasty, when used in recipes.
bass.location: Found by **Fishing** :fishing_pole_and_fish: anywhere outside the pond with **Fishing Rod Power** of at least **1**.

starfish.description: Aren't very tasty on their own, might even cause side effects. Rarely used in food, but useful in other recipes.
starfish.location: Found by **Fishing** :fishing_pole_and_fish: anywhere outside the pond with **Fishing Rod Power** of at least **1**.

mudcrab.description: A very territorial and tough crab, who often conceal themselves in surrounding mud. They pinch hard and are impossible to catch, but nonetheless make an excellent meal.
mudcrab.location: Found by **Fishing** :fishing_pole_and_fish: anywhere outside the pond with **Fishing Rod Power** of at least **1**.

coal.description: One of the most common, but extremely useful part of most tools and smelting recipes. Good for keeping a fire burning.
coal.location: Found by **Mining** :pick: in most areas with **Pickaxe Power** of at least **1**.

copper.description: A medium, fairly tough ingot to harvest even tougher materials. Useful in making copper equipment.
copper.location: Found by **Mining** :pick: in most areas with **Pickaxe Power** of at least **1**.

iron.description: A sturdy and fairly affordable metal useful in making iron equipment and used in many other recipes that require a sturdier metal.
iron.location: Found by **Mining** :pick: in most areas with **Pickaxe Power** of at least **1**.

ruby.description: An extremely valuable gem. Not so useful in making equipment as it is fairly fragile. Hauntingly beautiful to look at.
ruby.location: Found by **Mining** :pick: in most areas with **Pickaxe Power** of at least **1**.

blessed sunflower.description: A blessed flower with unknown magical capabilities. Often used in rituals and healing potions.

silverleaf.description: Very useful for binding and merging multiple elements into one. Almost like a glue.
